snippet: At almost 90, the stadium is in shambles, a symbol of mismanagement. A new plan for the once-proud venue is in the works.
abstract: Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum, at almost 90 years old, is in shambles, a symbol of mismanagement; new plan for the once-proud stadium is in the works, where the University of Southern California will assume control.
lead_paragraph: At almost 90, the stadium is in shambles, a symbol of mismanagement. A new plan for the once-proud venue is in the works.

headline.seo: New Plan Yields Hint of Hope for Aging L.A. Coliseum
headline.main: New Plan Yields Glimmer of Hope for Ramshackle Los Angeles Coliseum
headline.print_headline: New Plan Yields Glimmer of Hope for Ramshackle Los Angeles Coliseum
